Be your self.

1. Only Angel 
2. Woman 
3. Ever since New...
caption:
Be your self.

11 June , 2018
Setlist at Infinite Energy Arena, Duluth, GA, USA
1. Only Angel
2. Woman
3. Ever since New York
4. Two Ghosts
5. Carolina
6. Stockholm Syndrom (One Direction song)
7. Just a Little Bit of Your Heart (Ariana Grande cover)
8. Medicine
9. Meet Me in the Hallway
B-Stage
10. Sweet Creature
11. If I Could Fly (One Direction song)

12. Anna
13. What Makes You Beautiful (One Direction song)
14. Sign of the Times

Encore
15. From the Dining Table
16. The Chain (Fleetwood Mac cover)
17. Kiwi

summary: The sky was clouded, heavy, of a dank yellowish colour. Harry sat on the stairs with the silence ringing in his ears. As in many...
body:
The sky was clouded, heavy, of a dank yellowish colour.
Harry sat on the stairs with the silence ringing in his ears. As in many similar moments before, he thought about the tour bus and how he and the other boys used to listen to music on their iPods when they were tired of playing videogames or chatting.
With no electricity anymore in the world, it was now almost two years that his ears didn’t experience the sound of music, except for the songs he himself sung and played by memory, if during his wanderings he found a functioning guitar among some ruins - and if he had the heart of doing it, which was almost never.
It was now almost two years that he didn’t hear Louis’ voice.
Even though a memory of that sound would have stayed forever carved in his heart and brain, he would have given everything to relive it again.

—–

“What is this?” Harry asked, astounded.
“Um, a record player?” the stranger replied, with a small smirk.
Harry was too stunned to even roll his eyes. “I see that, but how did you fix it? How… Does it work?”
The stranger woman smiled more kindly and explained how she managed to connect it to a bike-powered electricity generator.
“It’s not the most efficient generator, and of course I use it for more useful things usually, but when I can I play some records that I was lucky enough to have bought at the time, instead of only using Spotify…”
“Bless you! (In the face of whoever thought girls were good for nothing… He thought) Can I see which records you have?”

“Sure, please…”


The records were just twentyish and a bit greasy with fuel, but Harry knelt in front of the small stash as if it was the holiest altar in the world.
It took less than 5 seconds to spot it: One Direction, Made in the A.M. Harry’s head felt a bit lighter and his heart started beating so fast he didn’t feel safe standing up.
He took it carefully in his hands and looked at the cover. His mind was starting to travel faster than it would have been safer for his heart to allow.


The woman had come to stand behind him; Harry felt her presence and turned around, a bit ashamed of his now unmistakably watery eyes. The woman however was still smiling kindly at him.
“I was a bit of a fan in my teenager years…” she said with a soft voice, as if she was also reminiscing the past. Harry couldn’t really speak, but smiled, teary.


“Do you want to listen to it?” the woman asked.
“Can I?” Harry asked, small. “I’ll action the bicycle” he offered.
The woman touched his shoulder and squeezed it briefly, as for comfort. “I’ll do it” she said “You can sit here and…” her voice faltered, she waved her hand, the right corner of her mouth raising in a half smile, and then she turned, going to the bicycle.


Harry put the record on. It had been a long time since he had used a real record player, and to be honest he had probably played an LP like five times in his life, so he didn’t really know where to place the head-shell. As a consequence, the music started playing in the middle of the album, just on the last verse of “End of the day”.


Harry knew which song was next. He sat on the ground and closed his eyes.

I’ve got scars even though they can’t always be seen
And pain gets hard, but now you’re here and I don’t feel a thing.

He couldn’t hold it anymore and burst out crying.

When the album finished playing and the silence returned, Harry had still his eyes closed and his cheeks wet with tears. The touch of a hand on his shoulder startled him and he looked at the woman through blurry eyes. She knelt in front of him, still smiling softly.


“Was it all true, then?” she asked, voice a bit broken, as cracked as Harry was feeling. “The compass, the ship, the anchor, the rope? Did you love him?”


“I did.” He answered, and somehow it felt wrong using the past tense. “I do. I will forever”.
body_abstract:
The sky was clouded, heavy, of a dank yellowish colour.
Harry sat on the stairs with the silence ringing in his ears. As in many similar moments before, he thought about the tour bus and how he and the other boys used to listen to music on their iPods when they were tired of playing videogames or chatting.
With no electricity anymore in the world, it was now almost two years that his ears didn’t experience the sound of music, except for the songs he himself sung and played by memory, if during his wanderings he found a functioning guitar among some ruins - and if he had the heart of doing it, which was almost never.
It was now almost two years that he didn’t hear Louis’ voice.
Even though a memory of that sound would have stayed forever carved in his heart and brain, he would have given everything to relive it again.

blog.name: heaterb13
blog.title: I'm Only Here For 1D
blog.description: 39 year old wife, mom of 2, and 1D fan

summary: My kids just now while getting ready to leave the house
body:
My kids just now while getting ready to leave the house

Five year old-“Momma are you going to work today?”

Me-“no, not today”

5 year old -“then why do you have fancy hair?”

3 year old -“yea, fancy like Harry Styles! He has fancy hair and looks like a prince!”

Me - 😭😍

tags: its a sign of the times
summary: Ok, time for a little vote....
title: Ok, time for a little vote....
body:
Now that I’ve started my new series, I’d like to know if you’re all still interested in Blurbs and socials from “It’s a Sign of the Times.” I have a few blurbs still saved up that I’ll post if you want them and the Instagram posts take time, so I’ll only keep making those if you’re interested. 

Jump into my inbox and let me know your thoughts

Erika. 28. She/Her/Aro/Ace. Living In Georgia. Music Obsessed. Confessed Former Fangirl. Nocturnal. Avid (Fan Fiction) Reader. Amateur Photographer.

Loves Louis Tomlinson and Sebastian Stan.

I reblog whatever I feel like reblogging.

I don't always follow back.

summary: holy fuck. i've gained over 30 followers over night before i even posted my (amazing) pictures. i literally just got home cause...
body: holy fuck. i’ve gained over 30 followers over night before i even posted my (amazing) pictures. i literally just got home cause i had to keep stopping to sleep (left the venue at 1am and it’s 8am now and it normally only takes 4 hours to get home…) so i’m about to crash and then upload my pictures and videos

Joanna.
Nick Grimshaw and his drivetime show, Harry Styles, 1d fandom (gryles! and zarry, sometimes: narry, horchata, tomlinshaw, lirry) and Zayn, a lot of cute animals and cute women, probably some feminism and political stuff, and everything else I feel like posting. Rihanna and Frank Ocean are my parents.
